import "./header.css" import { faBed, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { useState } from "react"; import {DateRange} from 'react-date-range'; import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import { format } from "date-fns"; const Header = (type) => { const [openDate, setOpenDate]= useState(false) const [date, setDate] = useState([{ startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' }]); const [openOptions, setOpenOptions]= useState(false) const [options, setOptions] = useState({ adult:1, children:0, room:1 }) const handleOption= (name, operation) =>{ setOptions(prev=>{return{ ...prev, [name]: operation ==="i" ? options[name] +1: options[name] -1, }}) } return (
Stays
Flights
Car rentals
Attractions
Airport taxis
{ type !== "list" && <>

Find your next stay

Search low prices on hotels, homes and much more...

setOpenDate(!openDate)}className="headerSearchText">{`${format(date[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format(date[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")}`} {openDate&& setDate([item.selection]) } moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className="date"/>}
setOpenOptions(!openOptions)} className="headerSearchText">{`${options.adult} adult 路 ${options.children} children 路 ${options.room} room`} {openOptions &&
Adult
{options.adult}
Children
{options.children}
Room
{options.room}
}
}
) } export default Header;
